product_name: Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil View Dry Sack
long_description: The Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil View dry sack features a clear thermoplastic urethane window that lets you easily view the contents inside so you can quickly get to the gear you need. Using a polyurethane coated, 30-denier siliconized nylon, fabric is waterproof, lightweight and durable for hiking and backpacking in wet conditions. Polyurethane coating on the inside offers the ultimate in waterproofness; seams are reinforced for strength and factory-taped for weatherproof protection. Trimming weight, Sea to Summit uses a lightweight side release buckle and a thinner roll top closure. Hypalon(R) watertight roll-top closure keeps contents secure and protected; fold the Hypalon strip down first and make at least 3 rolls before closing the buckle. Roll-top fabric sacks are not intended for complete submersion; sensitive electronic devices should be double-bagged or packed in a waterproof hard case for maximum protection. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: The Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil View dry sack features a clear thermoplastic urethane window that lets you easily view the contents inside so you can quickly get to the gear you need.
